briefTitle: Efficacy & Safety Study of Once-weekly Oral Aripiprazole in Children and Adolescents With Tourette's Disorder (TD)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Fixed-Dose Once-weekly Oral Aripiprazole in Children and Adolescents With Tourette's Disorder
summary: The goal of the current trial is to determine efficacy and safety of once-weekly aripiprazole in reducing Total Tic Severity (TTS) score in children and adolescents with Tourette's Disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline to Week 8 in Yale Global Tic Severity Scale (YGTSS) Total Tic Score
